comments: She is very rude and unhelp I would not recommend her to anyone ever

I took this course online she is a great teacher, easy and helpful. Just make sure to do your work by the deadline and you should be fine you read a chapter and take a quiz on it there is no midterm or no final. Just quizzes that are easy once a week after you read a chapter you take a quiz and do a discussion.

I took this class online and found it to be very easy to follow. There is a test per chapter (14) and most of them go with a discussion about the chapter. There are also three speeches where you would have to record yourself and upload the videos. I highly recommend this class if you are a person that can follow up without any supervision.

I took her online class and found it to be very comprehensive and easy to follow. You will have several speech outlines and videos to upload to she is very lenient. I highly recomment her and her class.
Great Professor! Took her class on-line and she was very helpful, answered my emails immediately and graded quickly. I would take her again in a heartbeat.

This teacher is awesome. The first day I took her she was full of energy, and even when the semester is almost over(where I am now) she STILL has all that energy. Her speeches are REALLY easy and she doesn\'t grade you harshly. If you need to get that credit for speech take her. Btw I like the fact that she doesn\'t use the book until the end =P
This professor likes to video tape students in her class. she gave 3 exams and 4 speeches in class and buy text book and blank video tape which she will record you during your speech.
Great speech professor. DO assignments, show up for class, participate, follow directions you will do great.
